access: A character who is a member of the Knights of Lastwall has access to this option.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impassable Wall Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1091) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 90 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Attack of Opportunity](/Feats.aspx?ID=145)

**Access**
A character who is a member of the Knights of Lastwall has access to this option.

</column>

---

You refuse to let foes past your guard. As long as you are in this stance, when you critically hit with an Attack of Opportunity triggered by a move action, you disrupt that move action.

<title level="2">Knights of Lastwall Class Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 90 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The following class feats are available to Knights of Lastwall. Those with the champion trait are champion class feats. Those with both the champion and fighter traits are both champion class feats and fighter class feats; when you take one of these feats, it loses the trait that doesn’t apply to your class.

**Related Feats**: [Everstand Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1087), [Everstand Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1088), [Light of Revelation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1089), [Sun Blade](/Feats.aspx?ID=1090)
name: Impassable Wall Stance
